channel.title: [Delta] Adding more player rights?
channel.description: So apparently my server doesn't have a donor rights playerright. How do i add another player right? (also need to do this to add co owner too.

item.title: [Delta] Adding more player rights?
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

You don’t necessarily have to have donors require a specific playerright, this all depends on the client. Though most Client have it through playerrights so have it through Donor, which you can declare as

Donor = 0 mean not donator
Donor = 1 means the player is a donator

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Adding more player rights?
item.dc:creator: @Bumm85 Bumm85
item.description:
@Bumm85 wrote:

Well you can’t just make up a player right for Co-Owner. You either make co-owner player rights 2 or 3 and then when you do a ::yell command you just make it set to that persons name so it says [Co-Owner]. For donator I think you might be able to add into the character file something like isdonator = ___ (MAYBE) Im not to sure about that. You could also make donator so its player rights 4. Just be careful you dont make any admin commands available to them.

Read full topic
